LANDING.CTA_DESCRIPTION: Discover quality new & used smartphones, phone accessories, and money transfer services at MinasPhone.

SMARTPHONE_REPAIRS.TITLE: Smartphone Repairs
SMARTPHONE_REPAIRS.DESCRIPTION: Expert repair services to fix your smartphone's hardware and software issues promptly.

DEVICE_UPGRADES.TITLE: Device Upgrades
DEVICE_UPGRADES.DESCRIPTION: Elevate your tech experience with our latest device upgrades for improved performance and features.

SCREEN_REPLACEMENTS.TITLE: Screen Replacements
SCREEN_REPLACEMENTS.DESCRIPTION: Get quick and reliable screen replacement services for cracked or unresponsive touchscreens.

ACCESSORIES.TITLE: Accessories
ACCESSORIES.DESCRIPTION: Discover a wide range of accessories to complement and enhance your electronic devices.

MONEYGRAM_SERVICES.TITLE: MoneyGram Partner
MONEYGRAM_SERVICES.DESCRIPTION: As an official MoneyGram partner, we offer a reliable and fast international money transfer service to send or receive money worldwide.

RIA_MONEY_TRANSFER.TITLE: Ria Partner
RIA_MONEY_TRANSFER.DESCRIPTION: In partnership with Ria, we provide fast and secure solutions for your international transactions, making sending and receiving money easier than ever.

REPAIRS.TITLE: SMARTPHONE REPAIRS
REPAIRS.DESCRIPTION_1: In an era where expensive smartphones with countless features dominate, the traditional classic mobile phone manages to maintain its value, and this is no coincidence.
REPAIRS.DESCRIPTION_2: We always use the best spare parts on the market for mobile repair. The criteria for their selection are performance and durability. The reason is that we want the best possible result and with duration over time in every repair.
REPAIRS.DESCRIPTION_3: We have taken care of our quality services and we offer them at the best possible prices on the market. In our store we make the most cost-effective mobile phone repairs.

CONTACT_US.TITLE: Contact Us Today
CONTACT_US.DESCRIPTION: Fill out the form below to get in touch with our team. We're here to answer any questions you may have and provide expert advice for all your electronics smartphone needs.
